body:
I realize hat this may have been done before...Buuut. I'm curious. 

I play:
Clarinet (4 years) 
Ocarina (2 years but never bothered to play it after first getting it until recently) Also It's a 6 hole sweet potato if you're curious. 
Harmonica (6 months only played once)
Recorder (1 year, barely played it)

Wondering if anyone knows how to play a piano, because that must be the coolest thing to know how to play! Violins are cool too.

replies.body: Violin, "twelve" — veridically, six — years, due to my apparent competence. Piano, "thirteen" years (only stayed consistent for about two). Guitar, one year, for a friend's old band. Recorder, one year, for music class in the fifth grade.
